headlines.description: The New York Giants actually held onto a second-half lead, dominating the Washington Redskins and clinching a 32-21 victory over Washington on Thursday night on Odell Beckham Jr.'s 30-yard score.

video.headline: Eli: Giants elevate play in fourth quarter

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Interview (Eli: Giants elevate play in fourth quarter) 2015/09/24 SC

headlines.shortLinkText: Giants dominate Redskins for season's 1st win

headlines.description: Matt Ryan and Julio Jones connected for two touchdowns, Devonta Freeman ran for 141 yards and three scores, and the Falcons beat Dallas 39-28 Sunday in the Cowboys' first game without Tony Romo.

video.headline: Running backs take game balls in Falcons' win over Cowboys

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Falcons-Cowboys Game Balls) 2015/9/27 NFL Nation TV DAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Falcons beat Cowboys behind Ryan-Jones combo, Freeman

headlines.description: Andrew Luck threw two touchdown passes 56 seconds apart in the fourth quarter as he rallied the Indianapolis Colts to their first win this season, beating the Tennessee Titans 35-33.

video.headline: Mariota being asked to do too much

headlines.shortLinkText: Luck rallies Colts to 1st win of season 35-33 over Titans

headlines.description: Derek Carr threw two touchdown passes, Latavius Murray rushed for 139 yards and the Oakland Raiders snapped an 11-game road losing streak, beating the Cleveland Browns 27-20 on Sunday.

video.headline: Raiders starting to believe in themselves

headlines.shortLinkText: Carr, Raiders end road skid with 27-20 win over Browns

headlines.description: Andy Dalton threw a 7-yard touchdown pass to A.J. Green with 2:10 left, and the Cincinnati Bengals remained unbeaten by defeating the Ravens 28-24 Sunday, dropping Baltimore to 0-3.

video.headline: Star wide receivers receive game balls for Bengals, Ravens

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Game Balls: Bengals-Ravens) 2015/09/27 NFL Nation TV

headlines.shortLinkText: Dalton, Green lead Bengals over winless Ravens 28-24

headlines.description: Tom Brady became the fourth quarterback in NFL history to throw 400 touchdown passes, connecting for a pair of scores on Sunday and leading the Patriots to a 51-17 victory over the Jaguars.

video.headline: Brady and Hurns earn game balls

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Pats-Jags Game Balls) 2015/9/27 NFL Nation TV

headlines.shortLinkText: Brady notches 400th TD pass in Patriots' win over Jags

headlines.description: Cam Newton threw for 315 yards and a pair of touchdowns to tight end Greg Olsen and also ran for a score, and the Carolina Panthers defeated the New Orleans Saints 27-22 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newton's 3 TDs lead Panthers past Saints 27-22

headlines.description: Darren Sproles returned a punt 89 yards for a score and added a 1-yard touchdown run, and the Philadelphia Eagles got their first win of the season by holding on to beat the New York Jets 24-17.

video.headline: Despite win, Eagles have a long way to go

headlines.shortLinkText: Sproles, defense help Eagles beat Jets for 1st win, 24-17

headlines.description: Ryan Mallett threw for threw for 228 yards and a touchdown and Alfred Blue had 139 yards rushing with a score to lead the Houston Texans to a 19-9 win over the Tampa Bay Buccaneers on Sunday.

video.headline: Alfred Blue responds for the Texans

headlines.shortLinkText: Mallett helps Texans to 1st win, 19-9 over Tampa Bay

headlines.description: Adrian Peterson plowed through San Diego's defense for 126 yards and two touchdowns on 20 rushes in three quarters on Sunday, and the Minnesota Vikings trampled Philip Rivers and the Chargers.

video.headline: The best way to run the Vikings' offense

headlines.shortLinkText: Peterson, Vikings trample banged up Chargers

headlines.description: Ben Roethlisberger was carted off the field with a knee injury in the second half and Pittsburgh's defense came through to give the Steelers a 12-6 victory over the St. Louis Rams on Sunday.
Carson Palmer threw for 311 yards and Arizona returned two of Colin Kaepernick's first four passes for touchdowns and the Cardinals romped past the San Francisco 49ers 47-7 on Sunday.
Tyrod Taylor threw for 277 yards and three scores in his first NFL road start Sunday, and the Buffalo Bills routed the Miami Dolphins 41-14.

video.headline: Defense, Rishard Matthews pick up game balls

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Bills-Dolphons Game Balls) 2015/9/27 NFL Nation TV

headlines.shortLinkText: Taylor throws 3 TD pass and Bills rout Dolphins 41-14

headlines.description: Tyler Lockett returned the second-half kickoff 105 yards for a touchdown, Russell Wilson connected with Jimmy Graham on a 30-yard TD, and the Seahawks routed the undermanned Bears.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lockett return ignites Seattle to 26-0 win over Chicago

headlines.description: Peyton Manning converted a fourth down with a 45-yard touchdown pass to Demaryius Thomas, and threw an 11-yard TD pass to Owen Daniels to lift the Broncos past the Lions on Sunday night.

video.headline: Defense carries Broncos, Calvin Johnson stands out

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Broncos/Lions Game Balls) 2015/9/27 NFL Nation TV

headlines.shortLinkText: Manning throws 2 TDs to help Broncos top Lions

headlines.description: Aaron Rodgers threw for 333 yards and five touchdowns, including three to Randall Cobb, and the Green Bay Packers beat the Kansas City Chiefs 38-28 on Monday night.

video.headline: Rodgers happy to have Jones back

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Interview (Aaron Rodgers After Packers' Win) 2015/9/28 SportsCenter

headlines.shortLinkText: Pack's Rodgers lights up Chiefs with 5 TDs in win
